metrics_conclusion: Piano Sonata No 14 ''Moonlight'' 2nd Movement has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Piano Sonata No 14 ''Moonlight'' 2nd Movement has sections analyzed in the following keys: A♭ Major,  and D♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
